SEARCH
Package smsapp.student

Interface StudentManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentManagerImpl
public interface StudentManager
Interface for managing students in a student management system. Provides methods for adding, removing, updating, and displaying students, as well as calculating the average grade of all students.

  • Method Summary
